title: Game over for Zika? KU Leuven researchers develop promising vaccine

title_detail.value: Game over for Zika? KU Leuven researchers develop promising vaccine

summary: Scientists have developed a new vaccine against the Zika virus. This vaccine should prevent the virus from causing microcephaly and other serious conditions in unborn babies.

summary_detail.value: Scientists have developed a new vaccine against the Zika virus. This vaccine should prevent the virus from causing microcephaly and other serious conditions in unborn babies.
